ValidationRule.description: To Prevent certain property fields from updating a property record when the property is active.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), $Profile.Name<> "System Administrator", OR( ISCHANGED(After_Repair_Value__c), ISCHANGED(Appraised_Value_Amount__c), ISCHANGED(Acquisition_Price__c), ISCHANGED(Rehab_Budget__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Acquisition Price, Current Appraised As Is Value, Renovation Budget, Current Appraisal After Repair Value, Approved Renovation Advance Amount and Reno Advance Amount cannot be changed while property is active.
